frontmatter.title: Chris Wood - ATD
frontmatter.excerpt: Ironic that he skates more vert now then street but a ripper regardless...
frontmatter.author: Curtis Mah

pageProps.content:
<!-- Markdown generator - https://jaspervdj.be/lorem-markdownum/ -->

Ironic that he skates more vert now then street but a ripper regardless. 
I flew into Adelaide for the first time and it was the beginning of the 
Boom Tour. Bonham said to look out for two skaters. That would be 
Dion Johnson and Chris Wood. Throughout the tour Chris killed it, without 
any push from myself. More so, "Hurry up and setup, Chris is going to 
land it!" Needless to say watching his current Insta clips on vert, shows 
nothings changed other than time. Always a pleasure.

## @chriswouldnt 99'
## about to die
## GoldCoast, Australia
